text: @DanBeale1 Interesting idea! We'll pass it on to our marketing team. Best, C at TTC
@shoegal1927 Hi Amanda, wider awareness/promotion of mental health issues can only serve to break down stigma. Visibility is a good thing.
@shoegal1927 though, is exactly the time when we need to know that others are there for us - that they are there when we feel able to talk.
@shoegal1927 Sure, I acknowledge that, and I'm sorry if you are feeling low at the moment. When we are fighting those personal battles (1/2)
@shoegal1927 Hi Amanda, it's OK not to want to join the Thunderclap - it's just another way to help challenge stigma. Best, C at TTC
@shoegal1927 not a fair comment. Many of us know how lonely it can feel to experience depression, & that's why we challenge stigma (2/2).
@shoegal1927 Hi Amanda, lots of people who work at Time to Change have personal experience of mental health problems, so that's (1/2)
